name: entertainer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 someone whose job is to entertain people by singing, telling jokes, etc.
Examples
Although her acting skills were limited, she was a great entertainer.We stopped to watch some street entertainers who were performing in the town square.The Royal Variety Show is an opportunity to see some of our finest entertainers - comedians, singers, dancers and magicians.She began her career as an entertainer on board cruise ships.Originally a DJ on local radio, he went on to become an all-round TV entertainer and personality.
